segments.text: Observing this scene, the kitchen feels so domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman in apron, focused on the dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the sink behind her is a total flood zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, no drain working, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's submerged, and she just keeps drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window offers a view of a serene garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes lining the path, all in order.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the boy's on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching deep into the cookie jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Plate in the other, maybe to steady or catch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand raised, eyes on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mischief could end in tears if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Or if mom slips in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a chaotic moment captured here.
segments.speaker: PAR
